ValidationRule.description: Limit which Statuses are used when a record is cloned
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && $Profile.Name = 'NSS Manager' && (ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Audit Approved') || ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Audit Rejected') || ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Audit Reject Final'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please pick a different status for this record.
